About this site



```{r}
library(ggplot2)
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load('2023-04-04')
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2023, week = 14)

soccer <- tuesdata$soccer

ggplot(soccer, aes(x=HF,y=AST))+
  geom_point()
```
